column4: Not sure how that prevents boot at that point. I've seen a driver mess up cause GDM to go into a reloading fit and force me to kill it from a terminal, but nothing with ramfs
your system should get to a point where you can alt-F1 into a terminal at least.. if that doesnt happen then it's not the driver it's something with your kernel
alt+f1 didnt get me now where, what else can i try?
